definitions.definition: The Elettaria cardamomum , an Indian herb .
The seed of Elettaria cardamomum , used as a medicine and spice , especially in curry powder .
Synonym of grains of paradise , the seeds or seed capsules of Aframomum melegueta , of East Africa.

main_definition: The Elettaria cardamomum , an Indian herb .
secondary_definitions: The seed of Elettaria cardamomum , used as a medicine and spice , especially in curry powder .
( uncommon , inexact ) Synonym of grains of paradise , the seeds or seed capsules of Aframomum melegueta , of East Africa.
